description: ## Overview Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Out-of-bounds Read via the processing of `IA_NA/IA_TA` options in a `DHCPv6` Advertise message. An attacker can cause an integer underflow leading to potential misuse of system resources or information disclosure by sending a crafted `DHCPv6` Advertise message. ## Remediation A fix was pushed into the `master` branch but not yet published. ## References - [Additional Information](https://blog.quarkslab.com/pixiefail-nine-vulnerabilities-in-tianocores-edk-ii-ipv6-network-stack.html) - [RedHat Bugzilla Bug](https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2258677)
remediation: A fix was pushed into the master branch but not yet published.
title: Out-of-bounds Read

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Out-of-bounds Read via the processing of IA_NA/IA_TA options in a DHCPv6 Advertise message. An attacker can cause an integer underflow leading to potential misuse of system resources or information disclosure by sending a crafted DHCPv6 Advertise message.
